titleStmt.title: Poems, and essays with a paraphrase on Cicero's Lælius, or Of friendship. Written in heroick verse by a gentleman of quality.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Edward, fl. 1669.
Cicero, Marcus Tullius. Laelius de amicitia. Paraphrases.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J[ames]. C[ottrell]. for W. Place, at Grays-Inne Gate in Holborn,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Edward Howard.
"Miscellanies, or essayes." (caption title) has separate pagination and register.
"A paraphrase in verso on Cicero's Lelius, or of friendship; written by him to Pomponius Atticus." (caption title) begins new pagination on leaf ² F6r.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
